_header: The token of the verray cross
Subjects: Justina, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Justina in the Scottish Legendary — in couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
[t]he takyne of þe verray croicews byd to luf in hart &
                    voice…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…ijc viijxx of ȝeris ewyneeftyr criste þai ware send
                    til hewine
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 2.50-60.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth

             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 2.152-75.
